message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,000. I know it's worth a lot to me, but I'm willing to negotiate. Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I believe I can only offer $14,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $16,000. This would still give you a good deal, and it's closer to the value I place on the product. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am able to offer $15,500 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
